text.div:
Tobacco Screening not Done, Medical Reason

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt
    Code Display
    1P Performance Measure Exclusion Modifier due to Medical Reasons
    4004F Patient screened for tobacco use and received tobacco cessation intervention (counseling, pharmacotherapy, or both), if identified as a tobacco user (PV, CAD)

name: Tobacco Screening not Done, Medical Reason
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward

concept.display: Performance Measure Exclusion Modifier due to Medical Reasons
